messages.body:
Hi there,

I'm trying to update my team's billing information but getting an error when saving the new credit card. The error message says 'Invalid billing address' but I've double-checked all the fields and they seem correct. Can you help me troubleshoot this?

Thanks,
Maria

Hi Maria,

Thanks for reaching out about the billing update issue. I've checked your account and noticed that the error is occurring because the new card's billing zip/postal code doesn't match what's on file with the card issuer.

To resolve this, please:

1. Verify the billing address matches exactly what's on your credit card statement
2. Make sure there are no special characters in the address fields
3. If you're outside the US, use the appropriate postal code format for your country

I can also help you update this manually if you prefer. Just provide:
• The last 4 digits of the new card
• The billing zip/postal code
• The country

I'll make sure it gets updated correctly on our end.

Best regards,
Alex

Thanks for the quick response, Alex!

You're right - I just checked with our finance team and the zip code was incorrect. I've updated it to match our corporate card's billing address (94103) and the card ending in 7299. Can you confirm if everything looks correct now?

Best,
Maria
